page.title: 13MANPOWER SERVICES COMMISSION
page.content: Runcorn Workshops run 2 acre site in Moss Lane as horticulural training centre.Employs 24 boys straight from school on 12 months training scheme. Boys selected by Careers Advisory Service.There is one Senior Instructor and 2 others.Boys have 3 months induction course.As well as general horticulture they have course in bee keeping.They spend one day a week at Halton College.They have 75% pass rate.They receive training allowance of Â£26.25 per week.The centre's annual grant is subsidised by the selling of produce grown. Walton Hall and Gardens has 7 Rangers employed for general duties in grounds.
